name: Samsons Quest
description:
** VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT **

A homage to games like Legend of Zelda with, hopefully, a bit of Larn/Moria type play thrown in for good measure!

Guide Samson on his epic quest to recover the "Something of Something".

Signpost are dotted around to interact with and the player will also receive info popups at various points.

Controls:

  • Move - arrow keys
  • R - read signpost
  • Left Ctrl - attack
